channel.title: Visualization on ANGGA FUADY
channel.description: Recent content in Visualization on ANGGA FUADY

item.title: Tableau: World Life Expectancy Dashboard
item.description: Highlights Objectives Shows female and male life expectancy for each country over time Compute the average life expectancy for each continent Outcome World life expectancy Dashboard Overview Life expectancy is the key metric for assessing population health. It tells us the average age of death in a population. Life expectancy has increased rapidly since the Age of Enlightenment. In the early 19th century, life expectancy started to increase in the early industrialized countries while it stayed low in the rest of the world.

item.title: Python: Shot on goal visualization
item.description: Highlights Objectives Web scraping of shot on goal in single match Show pitch visualization including shots coordinate Shows timing match Outcome Visualization of shot on goal location and its Outcome Visualization of timing match (minutes vs cumulative expected goal) In this project, we are interested in replication of shot on goal visualization and timing chart of EPL match between Liverpool and Wolverhampton Wanderers on May 22, 2022. Liverpool wins 3-1 against the opponent.

item.title: Tableau: Offline Retail Dashboard
item.description: Highlights Objectives Shows the profit trends over time Shows the average profit per state Shows the average profit per region over time Outcome The average profit for all states is USD 181.18 South Dakota has the highest average profit, while Montana has the lowest. Only in Central region, the average profit is higher in 2015 compare to in 2012 In 4th quarter of 2012, East region has the highest average profit Retail Dashboard Visualization process In this project, I use Tableau for building the dashboard.
